channel.title: The team project page! look!
channel.description:
ok...i know theres alot of good coders out there...
too many sources with good ideas...
how bout brainstorming 1 good source :)
im good at making my own models such as new weapons not on runescape and new areas and new graphics :)
if you interested post back :)

item.title: The team project page! look!
item.dc:creator: @armadyl_slayer armadyl slayer
item.description:
@armadyl_slayer wrote:

i dont even know reaper if you want in on the project just message me ok?

Read full topic

item.title: The team project page! look!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Why did this go straight to an argument when i leave mscp for about an hour or so…

How about we just post our ideas on the thread on here like we said we were going to. and if we can’t get past this whole “team” and “legal” bullshit then ill make my own thread and we can post the ideas on there. Theres 2 pages of posts that don’t have any positive input/ideas for private servers. stfu, people are idiots, we don’t need 2 fucking pages to understand people misunderstand.

by the way, armadyl, it says no teams unless you ask in the rules. thats why i posted what i said earlier.

On another topic

3) No development teams, however, showing off your recent development in runescape servers is accepted. We can make exceptions to the no development teams rule, pm a member of staff first.

Read full topic

item.title: The team project page! look!
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:25, topic:232993"][quote author=armadyl slayer link=topic=307265.msg2457230#msg2457230 date=1222298170]

…the only reason i said that is because as a model editor i can make the private server look nothing like runescape…

therefore it wouldn’t be runescape…

and the expression get noticed by jagex is no one can tell anyone about the project…

and this idea isn’t retarded…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 05:00:38 pm[/size][hr]sheesh!

lots of people know how to code in java

dont assume no one knows how too…!!!

yes, still copyright infringement. You could edit every detail of it. Except they still have the protocol copyrighted. I’ve discussed this before with people from Runescape Classic Servers.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 05:14:26 pm[/size][hr][quote author=armadyl slayer link=topic=307265.msg2457223#msg2457223 date=1222297985]
ok maybe copyright infringement a little…

but if you give credits to the creators of runescape its not copyright infringement…

you honestly cant say i just got you there…

and si force…

i never said im an expert…

i know little of all codings…

if you wanna complain put your head in a pillow until you die…

still it’s copyright infringement with credits. Don’t be retarted
[/quote]

im not retarded and if you give credits it means that it’s legal!

got learn some laws!!!

its not like your taking it changing 1 detail and saying i made it…runescape stole it from me…

so you dont be retarded
[/quote]
You’re an idiot.[/quote]

exactly what i said…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 05:25:08 pm[/size][hr][quote=“armadyl slayer, post:26, topic:232993”]ok what ever!!! but if jagex came on moparscape theres a legal action saying you are not jagex staff simply meaning that you can defend youself by saying they broke the rules…and also why would i notify jagex of a good server???[/quote]

you said you wanted to be recognized by jagex retard.

Read full topic
